move

movemovement marks the actual movement of one or more characters. [7.2.4 Stage Directions ]
Moduledrama â€” Performance texts
Attributes

    • @type
    characterizes the movement, for example as an entrance or exit.
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.enumerated
    @where
    specifies the direction of a stage movement.
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.authority
    @perf
    identifies the performance or performances in which this movement occurred as specified by pointing to one or more performance elements.
    Usage
    opt
    Datatype
    teidata.pointer
